mainSequence.step: User interacts with the Subscription Controller.
Subscription Controller forwards request to Subscription Facade.
Subscription Facade communicates with Subscription Repository.
Subscription Repository accesses data through Subscription JPA Persistence Adapter.
Subscription JPA Persistence Adapter interacts with Subscription JPA Repository.
Data is stored/retrieved from the Datastore through Subscription JPA Repository.
Data is sent back through the layers to User via Subscription Controller.
